name: Boxed In Time
description:
As a simple office worker, one day as you opened your takeout box, you traveled to different timelines where takeout boxes serve very different purposes, as the boxes for each timeline has one of its own use.

Traveling through these timelines and witnessing these takeout boxes' fate, you realized the connection between them, and maybe even to yourself...

INFO

This is a game jam submission that was made in 3 days. (The jam is 9 days long, but we only started working on it when there's 3 days left..)

CREDITS
